definitions: to be extremely annoyed, frustrated, or bored with a situation that has continued for too long
examples: I am fed up to the back teeth with his constant complaining.
She was fed up to the back teeth with the daily commute.
lemma: be fed up to the back teeth
synonyms: to have had it up to here
to be at the end of one's tether
source: to be fed up to the back teeth
